attributes.action: dissolve parliment and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is increasingly becoming clear that the level of incompetence shown by governmental offices in all departments is causing irreparable damage to the nation and its status within the global economy. 

It is time for the government to stand up to its responsibilities and let the people decide who would be the best party to repair the damage done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
